entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
